item.title: Realtek 8125 2.5Gb Ethernet work on FreeBSD
item.description: I decided to migrate my virtualization host to FreeBSD bhyve. During installation in my current hardware and one of the issues I had was the ethernet interface not being recognized in the system. Luckily I had access through a usb ethernet so I could run the following steps to make my onboard network work. Install the package realtek-re-kmod: pkg install realtek-re-kmod Add the following 2 lines to your /boot/loader.conf: if_re_load="YES" if_re_name="/boot/modules/if_re.
